name: Yu-Gi-Oh! Zexal
overview: Yu-Gi-Oh! Zexal is a Japanese manga and anime series and the third main spin-off series of the Yu-Gi-Oh! franchise. The manga began serialization in Shueisha's V-Jump magazine from December 2010 and is licensed in North America by Viz Media. The anime series, produced by Nihon Ad Systems and Studio Gallop, aired on TV Tokyo between April 2011 and September 2012, following the previous anime series, Yu-Gi-Oh! 5D's, with an English-language version airing in North America between October 2011 and August 2013. A second series, Yu-Gi-Oh! Zexal II, began airing in Japan on October 7, 2012 and in North America from August 18, 2013. The series aired on The CW's Saturday morning cartoon block, Toonzai, and continues to air on its successor, Vortexx, later airing on Nicktoons from April 2013. It now airs every Sunday at 11:30,on Nicktoons.

episodes.name: Go With the Flow, Part 1
episodes.overview: In Heartland, Yuma Tsukumo aspires to be the world's best Duelist. Despite this, he is not a good Duelist. When he ends up Dueling, Shark, a student known to have pro-level skills, odd things begin to happen and Yuma's story begins.

episodes.name: Go With the Flow, Part 2
episodes.overview: The Duel between Yuma and Ryoga comes to its conclusion. In order to take down "Leviathan Dragon", Yuma obtains a "Number" monster of his own, "Utopia".

episodes.name: In the End, Part 1
episodes.overview: Astral's been unable to leave since Yuma Dueled Shark, so, despite his reluctance, he's begun living with Yuma. At an inconvenient time, Akari Tsukumo has trouble when her PC she uses as a stay-at-home reporter crashes. When her big scoop is deleted as a result of a system down the city suffered, she orders Yuma to find an alternate scoop she can use for another manuscript. When Yuma goes into town, the traffic lights go nuts, causing downtown to fall into chaos. Yuma looks for the criminal who spread the computer virus that caused all this chaos.

episodes.name: In the End, Part 2
episodes.overview: Yuma challenges Professor Kitano, who is behind it all. Professor Kitano notes that each time he reduces his opponent's Life Points with "Electronic Computer-Beast Tera Byte" Astral's body weakens, causing him to slowly vanish! To make things worse, the Explosive Virus Time Bomb Ukyo has set is slowly reaching its countdown.

episodes.name: Flipping Out, Part 1
episodes.overview: A strange shadow approaches Yuma, which turns out to be Tokunosuke Omoteura, a classmate of Yuma's known for his duplicitous tongue. In the morning, Yuma was reprimanded for a prank he pulled in front of the whole class that he has no memory of causing. As a result, he's been cut off from every one else. Tokunosuke gently says "Let's Duel". With "Baby Tragon" his new Xyz Monster, Yuma might enjoy this duel, but Tokunosuke seems to be planning something.

episodes.name: Flipping Out, Part 2
episodes.overview: Tokunosuke steals Yuma's "Utopia", causing Astral to vanish. Tokunosuke had wanted the great power of Numbers, and Yuma tries to Summon "Leviathan Dragon" to fight back, but Tokunosuke's Trap Card takes even that away. When Yuma is pushed into a corner with his field, an unexpected monster will become the Trump Card of the Duel.

episodes.name: The Sparrow, Part 1
episodes.overview: After having been around a while and having to work with Yuma, Astral's been fascinated by a TV Show Hero named "Different Dimension ESPer Robin". For some reason, Astral feels close and similar to this Robin from an alternate universe. One day, pictures show up with Robin in a fight downtown! Yuma, prodded by Astral, goes with Kotori to where the autographs were taken and meets Robin's actor, a kid named Fuya! But Fuya is a timid boy who doesn't resemble the Robin they all admire in the slightest.

episodes.name: The Sparrow, Part 2
episodes.overview: The mysterious person posing as Robin around town was Fuya. Under the intolerable strain of being a hero, Fuya's heart has been dyed in darkness. Yuma challenges him to a Duel to save his soul. Robin, however, possesses "Number 83: Galaxy Queen". With it, he proceeds to summon one character after another from the TV Show. At first, Yuma and Astral were amused by this, but due to Galaxy Queen's almighty Monster Effect, they quickly grow impatient. To make things worse, Galaxy Queen, who currently possesses Robin, has taken on the appearance of Fuya's mother.

episodes.name: Feline Frenzy
episodes.overview: A suspicious shadow is trailing Yuma. It seems someone has been after Yuma, and their identity is the unassuming girl Cat-chan from Yuma's class. Yuma and Kotori fall into Cat-chan's trap. To rescue Kotori, he's going to have to Duel. Astral is cautious of the strange vibes he's getting from Cat-chan, especially with the strategy of her "Transforming Cat Deck"!

episodes.name: Shark Attack
episodes.overview: Yuma is reminded that his victories in his current Duels are due to Astral's help. To prove his skills, he fights Shark once more. Though Shark doesn't care to Duel again, he finally agrees when he finally reaches the end of his rope due to Yuma's constant following him around. The Duel of these two begins. Can Yuma win against Shark, who has no "Number" cards, when he himself declares he won't use his "Number" cards or require the aid of Astral!?

episodes.name: The Pack, Part 1
episodes.overview: After his Duel with Shark, Yuma Duels Tetsuo Takeda without "Numbers" and loses twenty times in a row, with Tetsuo angry because Yuma lied about not using the "Numbers" against Shark. Yuma is scolded by Astral on his immaturity. On the other hand, Shark returns to "his place" where he gets involved in criminal company. Yuma, who knew what was going on with Shark, challenges the two strongest thugs: Rikuo and Kaio, to what Shark proposes to be a 2 on 2 "Tag-Team Duel".

episodes.name: The Pack, Part 2
episodes.overview: Yuma finds himself pinned down by the overwhelming power of "Number 61: Volcasaurus". To protect their precious remaining Life Points, he defends Shark at his own expense. When their opponents summon their second Number monster at that point, Astral becomes aware of the hidden mysteries underlying the Duel. In a last-ditch effort, Shark notices Yuma's passion and entrusts him with 1 card that could turn the whole Duel around!

episodes.name: The Number Hunter, Part 1
episodes.overview: After a series of incidents, Yuma and Astral learn of the existence of a "Number Hunter". Astral remains wary of an unseen presence, but Yuma pretends not to care. As a result, a series of strange phenomena appear around these two. Undeniably, these are the signs of the coming of the "Number Hunter" named Kaito Tenjo. At that moment, a dangerous Duel with the Numbers cards on the line begins. With Kaito's power far beyond their reckoning, what can Astral or Yuma possibly do?

episodes.name: The Number Hunter, Part 2
episodes.overview: In just 1 Turn, Kaito Summons 2 Numbers. Yuma attempts to resist the onslaught, but all of his monsters have been removed from the field...! Kaito, capable of even more, summons the strongest Monster to exist: "Galaxy-Eyes Photon Dragon", which has never been seen before! Yuma summons "Number 39: Utopia" to create a turnaround despite the impossible odds facing him.

episodes.name: Training Days, Part 1
episodes.overview: Having clearly seen Kaito's power, and how utterly hopeless they are, Yuma and Astral are keenly aware that they cannot easily recover. At that time, Yuma talks to his grandmother. She mentions a mysterious old man named Jurou at a "Duel Lodge" who owns a wooden statue of the Legendary Monster "Dark Magician", who is waiting for Yuma and his crew. Yuma makes a strong wish based on his desire to train and get better!

episodes.name: Training Days, Part 2
episodes.overview: It's a Duel against Jurou's former disciple, Yamikawa! Yamikawa draws his Ninja monsters, pinning Yuma down, but believing in the power of his friends, Yuma must continue this battle to the Death! But, Yamikawa summons his Trump Card, the Number Monster "Armed Ninja - Crimson Shadow"! However Yuma continues to believe in the power of his friends, but can this possibly lead him to win the Duel!?

episodes.name: It's in the Cards, Part 1
episodes.overview: Kotori and her friends, who are interested in the Number cards, plus Astral, form the "Number Club". To get more info about the Numbers, they visit the home of a fortuneteller, but the fortuneteller is under the orders of Kaito to collect the Number Cards! When the fortuneteller, Jin, kidnaps Kotori and the rest, Yuma and Astral come to the rescue, but the memory of their Duel with Kaito comes back, the visions of which continue to haunt them!

episodes.name: It's in the Cards, Part 2
episodes.overview: To save Kotori and the rest, Yuma continues to fight with Jin over the Numbers. Yuma's Life Points continue to fall, putting the fate of Kotori and the rest in a perilous situation, as Jin worsens things by summoning a second Numbers. In the midst of such a terrible pinch, Astral finds himself scared by Kaito's looming shadow, but when he sees Yuma who refuses to give up, he steps back up to the fight. With the feelings of these two guys, "Utopia" obtains a new power!

episodes.name: Events of Happiness
episodes.overview: Yuma misplaces the the Emperor's Key that was an important momento from his parents. He and Astral look high and low for it, but they just can't seem to find it. While they look, Astral is curious as to how the Emperor's Key is related to Yuma's father. Yuma starts talking about various memories from his childhood that he remembers about his dad. Yuma's Never-Give-Up Spirit "Kattobingu" was born from a promise he made with his father.

episodes.name: Roots of the Problem
episodes.overview: Yuma safely recovers "Number 96: Black Mist" from a man. Tetsuo, who witnessed the Duel, takes note that Yuma seems suddenly more brutal in his strategy, and ends up in a fight with him. Not having reconciled in over 2 days, suddenly Number 96 swallows Yuma and Astral up!! To rescue Yuma and Astral from Number 96, Tetsuo fights the Numbers for the first time!

episodes.name: Battle with the Bot
episodes.overview: As they head home from class, Yuma and his friends meet Lilly whom they form a friendship with. However after the robot is reprogrammed to its former self, Yuma duels Lilly in order to help regain her memories.

episodes.name: Reginald's Counterattack
episodes.overview: In order to protect Yuma's Key from Kite, Shark faces him in a Duel.

episodes.name: Hunting Down the Hunter, Part 1
episodes.overview: While Yuma seeks for his Key, Astral duels against Kite to defend the Number cards he possesses.

episodes.name: Hunting Down The Hunter, Part 2
episodes.overview: Despite being unable to fight against the immense power of Galaxy-Eyes Photon Dragon, Astral, his resolve stern due to Feeling the Flow, continues a desperate combo of Offense and Defense. But when he finally gives up against Kite who keeps attacking him over and over, Yuma appears and the mysterious ZEXAL power activates...

episodes.name: Frozen in Time
episodes.overview: One morning, Yuma heads to school, and while talking to his friends, time stops. He sees three suns shining in the sky. Together with Astral, they both shiver from a fear they do not understand, causing Yuma to run off to find out what possibly could have happened. At that time, Kite, using Dr. Faker's technology, retraces Astral's memories and invites Yuma to the World Duel Carnival.

episodes.name: Party Panic
episodes.overview: Yuma and his friends get all decked out for the event of the year - the World Duel Carnival Finals party! But when Yuma forgets his invite, can he find a way into the festivities, or will he be forced to hit the road and head home early?!

episodes.name: Roller Duel!
episodes.overview: It's time for the World Duel Carnival Finals! But prepare for a world of twists and turns because the finalists will be dueling on a roller coaster! Can Yuma handle the ups and downs of the competition, or will he be sent for a loop?!

episodes.name: Roller Coaster Rampage!
episodes.overview: To assess Yuma's dueling skills, Vetrix hires the Triad of Terror, a trio of cunning card sharks, to triple team him! Yuma better figure out a way to roll through this threesome before his dueling goes off the rails!

episodes.name: Test Your Luck!
episodes.overview: The World Duel Carnival takes a dark turn as the finalists descend into the Dragon's Den, a dark and dangerous duel track that will bring defeat for many a duelist!

episodes.name: Welcome to the Jungle
episodes.overview: The heat's on when Vetrix and Dextra duel in the jungle to decide who moves on to the World Duel Carnival semifinals!

episodes.name: Portal of Doom
episodes.overview: Quinton takes a timeout during his duel against Kite to reveal the long hidden mystery about Yuma's father's disappearance!

episodes.name: Cosmic Chaos
episodes.overview: Quinton and Kite's confrontation in the cosmos comes to a climactic conclusion!

episodes.name: Depths of Darkness
episodes.overview: Shark finally faces off with his archenemy, Quattro! Will Shark get his long awaited revenge, or will he end up sleeping with the fishes?!

episodes.name: Swimming with Sharks
episodes.overview: It's the cataclysmic conclusion between Shark and Quattro! If Shark doesn't make a comeback from the depths of defeat, not only is he out of the tournament, but his quest for justice will go unserved!

episodes.name: Rockin' and Rollin'
episodes.overview: There's chaos in the canyon when Yuma duels Nistro to see who will get the last spot in the World Duel Carnival semifinals! Can Yuma dodge defeat in the desert, or is Nistro destined to rock Yuma's world?

episodes.name: Doctor Visit
episodes.overview: When Yuma's deck goes missing, he and the gang set out to look for it! But when their search leads them to Heartland City, they end up finding much more than they bargained for!

episodes.name: Duel of Destiny: Part 1
episodes.overview: Yuma sets his sights on reeling in Shark in the first battle of the semifinals, but when his foe starts off dueling like a guppy, Yuma questions if he's being baited! Does Yuma learn this far too late to escape a sinister Shark attack?

episodes.name: Duel of Destiny: Part 2
episodes.overview: This is it! Yuma's jaw-dropping duel against Shark in the World Duel Carnival semifinals draws to a finish! Can Yuma rise above his razor-sharp rival, or will he be dragged down to the depths of defeat?

episodes.name: The Hart of the Matter
episodes.overview: The mighty masked duelist Vetrix faces off against the Number Hunter Kite! Unfortunately for Kite, Vetrix springs a shocking surprise that makes dueling all but impossible!

episodes.name: Change of Hart
episodes.overview: The explosive end to the battle between Kite and Vetrix roars to a finish!

episodes.name: Sphere of Fear: Part 1
episodes.overview: It all comes down to this! Yuma squares off against Vetrix in a battle that will determine the first ever World Duel Carnival Champion!

episodes.name: Sphere of Fear: Part 2
episodes.overview: As the duel between Vetrix and Yuma races to its cataclysmic conclusion, Yuma stares down defeat and comes face-to-face with Vetrix's shocking secret!

episodes.name: Sphere of Fear: Part 3
episodes.overview: This is it! The earth-shattering ending of Yuma's duel against Vetrix! Can Yuma rise above Vetrix's unrelenting onslaught, or will he meet defeat and lose everything he holds dear: his soul, his Numbers and... Astral?

episodes.name: The Countdown Begins
episodes.overview: Yuma learns the details of Dr. Faker's diabolical plan to destroy Astral World! Can Yuma figure out a way to stop Faker, or is the future of Astral World a thing of the past?

episodes.name: A Trio's Challenge: Part 1
episodes.overview: Kite, Shark and Yuma join forces to take down Dr. Faker! Can this trio work together as a team and put an end to Faker's fury, or will Faker and his deck prove to be too much of a challenge for these three fearless friends?

episodes.name: A Trio's Challenge: Part 2
episodes.overview: With the fate of Astral World hanging in the balance, Yuma, Kite and Shark set their sights on stopping Dr. Faker, but before our three heroes can make their final move, Dr. Faker reveals the shocking reason behind his diabolical plan!

episodes.name: A Trio's Challenge: Part 3
episodes.overview: When a mysterious being from Barian World appears, Yuma, Kite and Shark must work together and battle like never before if they want to save Hart, Astral World... and themselves!

episodes.name: Kite's Plight: Part 1
episodes.overview: The stage is set for the ultimate battle between Yuma and Kite, but just when Yuma's about to high five the sky, Kite brings him crashing down to earth with a startling revelation!

episodes.name: Kite's Plight: Part 2
episodes.overview: The back and forth battle between Kite and Yuma comes to an exciting conclusion that leaves one of our duelists down for the count! Will Yuma's dream of pulling out a victory become a reality, or is Kite going to turn this dream into a nightmare?

episodes.name: Attack of the Barians: Part 1
episodes.overview: The Barian invasion begins! Yuma faces a dangerous new enemy who will go to any extreme to gain possession of Yuma's Numbers in order to destroy Astral and his home!

episodes.name: Attack of the Barians: Part 2
episodes.overview: Yuma's battle with a dangerous and powerful soldier of Barian World continues as he strives to keep Astral safe! Can Yuma beat this Barian enemy and his new Chaos Monster, or will Yuma end up losing what is most valuable to him... Astral?

episodes.name: Hard Knox
episodes.overview: When pro duelist Devon Knox teaches a special class, Yuma gets taken to the school of hard knocks and learns a valuable lesson about the Barians he won't soon forget!

episodes.name: Rule Duel
episodes.overview: Ray nominates Yuma to run against Caswell for the position of Class Representative, but when the Ray Way takes a turn for the worse, Yuma finds himself facing off against a Student Council President who's been corrupted by the Barians!

episodes.name: The Adventures of Artimus Stanleyus
episodes.overview: Shark gets hooked into a battle with the Barians when the President of the Comic Book Appreciation Club challenges him to a duel! Can Shark outdraw the competition, or will his Number and life points be erased?

episodes.name: Doom in Bloom
episodes.overview: Shark's sister Rio makes a big splash on her first day at school, but not all the attention she gets is good, especially when she catches the eye of a Barian botanist!

episodes.name: Rivals in the Ring
episodes.overview: A new Barian threat arrives on the scene looking to take Yuma's Numbers, but his plan gets tripped up when he falls head over heels for Tori!

episodes.name: The Friendship Games
episodes.overview: When Yuma's buddies can't stop bickering, it's time for them to face-off in the Friendship Games, a sports dueling competition with surprises around every corner... including Barians!

episodes.name: Sphere Cube Calamity: Part 1
episodes.overview: A dangerous new Barian enemy arrives, and he's bringing one of his world's most powerful weapons to take down Yuma and Astral!

episodes.name: Sphere Cube Calamity: Part 2
episodes.overview: Mizar batters Yuma to his breaking point... until a surprise duelist steps in to take down Mizar and go claw-to-claw with his Galaxy-Eyes!

episodes.name: Playing Defense
episodes.overview: In order to set Yuma straight, Shark steals Yuma's Key! Can Yuma find the courage to face Shark, or will Yuma's fears leave him cowering for cover?!

episodes.name: Counter Offensive: Part 1
episodes.overview: Let's get ready to duuuuuuuuel! Yuma steps into the ring with Alito, but can he dodge this Barian's Battlin' Boxers before they send him to the canvas for a ten count?!

episodes.name: Counter Offensive: Part 2
episodes.overview: It's Round 2 of the heavyweight battle between Yuma and Alito! Can Yuma bob and weave his way around Alito's attacks, or will this Barian's fancy footwork finish him off for good?

episodes.name: Dual Duel: Part 1
episodes.overview: Girag's got revenge on his mind and Ray in his sights, but when Yuma steps in to save the day, the Ray Way steers Yuma off course!

episodes.name: Dual Duel: Part 2
episodes.overview: Girag has Yuma and Ray in the palm of his hand, but will a secret that Ray has been keeping help our heroes escape the clutches of this Barian behemoth?!

episodes.name: Darkness Dawns
episodes.overview: Astral and Yuma face a challenge so daunting that they must turn to their biggest adversary for help!

episodes.name: You Give Love a Bot Name
episodes.overview: When Orbital 7 crashes into Lillybot, it's love at first sensor! So when he discovers his beloved bot is in trouble, he motors to free her from her tormentor... Yuma!

episodes.name: Take a Chance
episodes.overview: Shark's trying to control Rio's life and she's not taking it anymore! Will this family feud turn into a feeding frenzy for Shark, or will Rio put her brother's winning streak on ice?!

episodes.name: An Imperfect Couple: Part 1
episodes.overview: The gang's dressed up as their favorite monsters for the school's fun fair, but when Anna crashes the festivities, the party ends for Yuma!

episodes.name: An Imperfect Couple: Part 2
episodes.overview: Being Anna's boyfriend is a dangerous job, but when Anna's teacher plays a Barian card, Yuma finds out just how dangerous it is!

episodes.name: Enter Vector
episodes.overview: Yuma is confronted by an enemy from the past who casts a dark shadow on his future!

episodes.name: The Search for Shadows
episodes.overview: Yuma embarks on a dangerous mission to rescue Ray from the evil clutches of Vector!

episodes.name: Shadows of Deception
episodes.overview: The Barians are on the attack, and Yuma is ready to risk everything to rescue Ray! But when Vector reveals a terrifying truth, Yuma's dream of saving Ray turns into a nightmare!

episodes.name: Sinister Shadows
episodes.overview: Still reeling from Vector's revelation that he and Ray Shadows are one and the same, Yuma looks to make Vector pay for all his lies! But with Astral learning of Yuma's own deceptions, will Yuma have to face Vector alone?!

episodes.name: Shadows End
episodes.overview: All the cards are on the table! Can our heroes defeat the dark and dangerous Barians, or will they end up one card short?
